author: cmpilato
msg: More fixes for commit stuff.  The only tests currently expected to
fail are commit-tests 11 (because some code from the old commit system
wasn't brought into the new one) and 15 (for reasons not yet
(harvest_committables): Recurse on replaced things, but not deleted
ones.  Also, set the 'adds_only' flag for all added things,
depending on the presence of the copyfrom URL.
(commit_unversioned_thing): Change the error text expected in this test.

author: cmpilato
msg: Geez.  Maybe this time these will actually be correct.

author: cmpilato
msg: Repair these files after they were destroyed by a corrupted working copy!
(handle_resource): Fix a bug I wrote.  If the type is BASELINE, exit
after snarfing up the revision number.

author: cmpilato
msg: (build_tree_from_commit): Update regular expressions used to build
Remove some comments about 'Replacing' being a "stacked" verb.  It's
not stacked anymore -- it's a first-class verb!
